Entity.Description: Stores information on inventory alerts raised by the system.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Alerts

Attribute.Description: Primary key of YFS_Inventory_Alerts.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Alert_Key

Attribute.Description: Inventory item for which alert was raised for.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: Ship node.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Node

Attribute.Description: Type of alert.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Type

Attribute.Description: Date alert was raised.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Raised_On

Attribute.Description: Deprecated. Start date of period for which alert was raised using the INVENTORY_MONITOR.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Period_Start

Attribute.Description: Deprecated. End date of period for which alert was raised using the INVENTORY_MONITOR.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Period_End

Attribute.Description: Available Quantity corresponding to the AlertLevel.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Quantity

Attribute.Description: Level of alert raised. 3 for low, 2 for medium, 1 for high, and 0 for thresholds greater.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Level

Attribute.Description: Deprecated. Action raised using the INVENTORY_MONITOR.
Attribute.Name: Alert_Action

Attribute.Description: Total on-hand inventory available quantity. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).
Attribute.Name: Onhand_Available_Quantity

Attribute.Description: Date when on-hand inventory quantity is available.
Attribute.Name: Onhand_Available_Date

Attribute.Description: Maximum future inventory available quantity within the monitoring period. The end of the monitoring period is determined by the lead time override (if specifies) in the monitor rule or the lead time of the monitoring item. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).
Attribute.Name: Future_Available_Quantity

Attribute.Description: Earliest date when any future inventory will be available.
Attribute.Name: First_Future_Available_Date

Attribute.Description: Date when the maximum future inventory will be available.
Attribute.Name: Future_Available_Date

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for a distribution rule.
Attribute.Name: Distribution_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: Deprecated. This flag indicates if the distribution rule id is the default distribution rule id for the inventory organization running the REALTIME_ATP_MONITOR.
Attribute.Name: Is_Default_Distribution_Group

Attribute.Description: This field contains availability information matrix containing ship dates and corresponding available quantity for each date.
Attribute.Name: Availability_Info

Attribute.Description: The distribution rule ID owner the alert was raised for.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The latitude of the node for which this alert. If the alert is for a distribution group, then this will be null.
Attribute.Name: Latitude

Attribute.Description: The longitude of the node for which this alert. If the alert is for a distribution group, then this will be null.
Attribute.Name: Longitude

Attribute.Description: The estimated cost of the item to be fulfilled by the ShipNode. Includes item cost and outbound handling cost.
Attribute.Name: Estimated_Cost

Attribute.Description: The delivery method used for computing the alert information.
Attribute.Name: Delivery_Method

Attribute.Description: The amount of unassgined on hand quantity that is being balanced to the distribution group. Internal purposes only.
Attribute.Name: Unassigned_Onhand_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The amount of unassgined future quantity that is being balanced to the distribution group. Internal purposes only.
Attribute.Name: Unassigned_Future_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The amount of quantity procured to accommodate inventory available.
Attribute.Name: Procured_Qty

Attribute.Description: The amount of time needed for procurement. This is the transit time and receipt processing times added together. This is measured in hours.
Attribute.Name: Procurement_Lead_Time

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores details about the parent alert if shipping calculation is enabled.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Alert_Detail

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_INVENTORY_ALERT_DETAIL table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Alert_Detail_Key

Attribute.Description: Inventory item for which details are provided.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_INVENTORY_ALERTS table for which this detail applies.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Alert_Key

Attribute.Description: The date when this inventory is available.
Attribute.Name: Max_Ship_Date

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for which the ShipDate becomes effective. This is an inclusive timestamp.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective until. This is calculated based on earliest timestamp of the computed date of each node. The computed date of each node is computed based on the last cut-off time of the ship date and subtract back the minimum notification time based on the node's shipping calendar. This is an exclusive timestamp.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Until_Date

Attribute.Description: This indicates the available quantity. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).
Attribute.Name: Available_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the AvailableQuantity is based on on-hand supply.
Attribute.Name: Is_Onhand

Attribute.Description: The amount of quantity procured to accommodate inventory available.
Attribute.Name: Procured_Qty

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This table stores audit information for inventory.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Audit

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the YFS_INVENTORY_AUDIT table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Audit_Key

Attribute.Description: The inventory item associated with this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: The code of the organization that maintains the item.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the item.
Attribute.Name: Item

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the item of this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The product class for the item of this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The ship node associated with this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Ship_Node

Attribute.Description: The adjusted quantity on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Quantity

Attribute.Description: The quantity of the supply being audited after the adjustment.
Attribute.Name: On_Hand_Qty

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: On_Hand_Held_Qty

Attribute.Description: The unit cost for the item on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Cost

Attribute.Description: The transaction type on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Type

Attribute.Description: The account number on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Account_No

Attribute.Description: The reference1 for this inventory audit. If the inventory adjustment is the result of a change in the order for which the inventory is associated, the order's OrderHeaderKey will be posted as the value of Reference1.
Attribute.Name: Reference_1

Attribute.Description: The reference2 for this inventory audit. If the inventory adjustment is the result of a change in the order line for which the inventory is associated, the order line's OrderLineKey will be posted as the value of Reference2.
Attribute.Name: Reference_2

Attribute.Description: The reference3 for this inventory audit. If the inventory adjustment is the result of receiving order, the receipt's ReceiptHeaderKey will be posted as the value of Reference3. If the inventory adjustment is the result of shipment confirmation, the shipment's ShipmentHeaderKey will be posted as the value of Reference3.
Attribute.Name: Reference_3

Attribute.Description: The reference4 for this inventory audit. If the inventory adjustment is the result of receiving order, the receipt line's ReceiptLineKey will be posted as the value of Reference4. If the inventory adjustment is the result of shipment confirmation, the shipment line's ShipmentLineKey will be posted as the value of Reference4.
Attribute.Name: Reference_4

Attribute.Description: The reference5 for this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Reference_5

Attribute.Description: The code of the reason for this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the reason for this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: The cost currency on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Cost_Currency

Attribute.Description: The lot number on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: The revision number on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Revision_No

Attribute.Description: The batch number on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The tag number on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: The ship by date on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The supply type on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Supply_Type

Attribute.Description: The inventory segment on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The inventory segment type on this inventory audit.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: This field is populated only when the user does a WMS inventory adjustment. Other cases, the defuault value will get populated. All transactions within a transaction boundary are logged with same audit sequence in location inventory audit and corresponding inventory audits.
Attribute.Name: Sequence_No

Entity.Description: This table stores configuration information for setting up inventory monitoring rules.
Entity.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rules

Attribute.Description: Primary key of YFS_Inventory_Monitor_Rules.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rules_Key

Attribute.Description: Organization which maintains the inventory monitor rule.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Inventory monitor rule.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rule

Attribute.Description: Name of inventory monitor rule.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rule_Name

Attribute.Description: Maximum monitor days to monitor to, from current date. For the REALTIME_ATP_MONITOR agent, if the the maximum monitor days is setup with value greater than 0, it will be used to calculate the horizon date instead of the item's lead days.
Attribute.Name: Max_Monitor_Days

Attribute.Description: Level 1 (high) quantity to monitor for inventory within the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level1_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity is less then or equals to LEAD_TIME_LEVEL1_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level1_Action

Attribute.Description: Level 2 (med) quantity to monitor for inventory within the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level2_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity is less then or equals to LEAD_TIME_LEVEL2_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level2_Action

Attribute.Description: Level 3 (low) quantity to monitor for inventory within the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level3_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity is less then or equals to LEAD_TIME_LEVEL3_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Lead_Time_Level3_Action

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Level 1 quantity to monitor for inventory beyond the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level1_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity beyond lead time is less then or equals to BEYOND_LEAD_TIME_LEVEL1_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level1_Action

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Level 2 quantity to monitor for inventory beyond the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level2_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity beyond lead time is less then or equals to BEYOND_LEAD_TIME_LEVEL2_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level2_Action

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Level 3 quantity to monitor for inventory beyond the lead time.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level3_Qty

Attribute.Description: (Deprecated as of 9.5) Action to perform when available quantity beyond lead time is less then or equals to BEYOND_LEAD_TIME_LEVEL3_QTY.
Attribute.Name: Beyond_Lead_Time_Level3_Action

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the inventory monitor rule is disabled.
Attribute.Name: Disable_Flag

Attribute.Description: The type of the inventory monitor rule. Values: EVENT - used for the event based monitor. ACTION(Deprecated as of 9.5) - used for the action based monitor. Default value: ACTION.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rule_Type

Attribute.Description: Whenever availability falls below the level set for AlwaysRaiseBeyondLevel, alert will always be raised. Valid Values:{1,2,3}
Attribute.Name: Always_Raise_Beyond_Level

Attribute.Description: When Inventory reaches this level, Procurements will be considered into the future availability. Valid values:{1,2,3}
Attribute.Name: Consider_Procurement_At_Level

Entity.Description: This internal configuration table links inventory bucket with order status based on document type. When order status is changed, application looks into this table to determine how inventory updates should be done. Inventory is updated for buyer and seller organizations. For buyer organizations, supply is moved from one bucket to another. For seller organizations, both supply and demand are moved from one bucket to another.

Entity.Description: This table stores details about serial numbers. Since serial number scanning is an overhead if it has to be done at every single move operation in the warehouse for tracking purposes, warehouses typically just record the fact that the serial number has reached the warehouse during the receiving process. Similarly, the serial number is scanned at shipping to record the fact that the serial number has left the warehouse. So, the location at any time is the last location at which it was scanned. Similarly, the ship node on the serial number will reflect the ship node at which it was last scanned.
Entity.Name: Global_Serial_Num

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_ GLOBAL_SERIAL table.
Attribute.Name: Global_Serial_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the inventory item associated with the serial number.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Item_Key

Attribute.Description: Serial number of the item. This is expected to be unique across each instance of an item.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: Identifies a parent item's serial in which this serial resides.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Serial_Key

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_1

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_2

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_3

Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_4

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_5

Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_6

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_7

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_8

Attribute.Description: Component serial numbers of the item. For example if we are recording serial number of the computer as SERIAL_NO, we could store the serial number of the battery, hard disk etc. in the secondary serial fields.
Attribute.Name: Secondary_Serial_9

Attribute.Description: Primary key attribute of YFS_SHIP_NODE table. The ship node on the serial number will reflect the ship node at which it was last scanned.
Attribute.Name: Shipnode_Key

Attribute.Description: Unique key to the YFS_INVENTORY_TAG table. Indicates the tag associated with the serial number.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the serial is within the ship node or has left the ship node. Y - indicates that the serial is in the ship node and N - left the ship node.
Attribute.Name: At_Node

Attribute.Description: Fifo number associated with the serial. A date based inventory attribute that helps understand the order in which stock arrived at the node. This is used to send out items that arrived earlier than the ones that arrived later.
Attribute.Name: Fifo_No

Attribute.Description: The receipt header key that is associated with this serial. This helps identify all stocks attached to a receipt. This number is of significance until the sample from the receipt has been certified as having passed or failed QC. This number is used to pull out all stocks based on the receipt.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The country in which the item was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Country_Of_Origin

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The primary key of the INV_MON_RULE_FULFILLMENT_TYPE table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rule_Fulfillment_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: Primary key of YFS_Inventory_Monitor_Rules table.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Monitor_Rules_Key

Attribute.Description: The type of Fulfillment Type for consideration. Valid values: PROCURE
Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: The Fulfillment Type to consider for Procurement.
Attribute.Name: Fulfillment_Type

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was created.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: Timestamp when the record was last modified.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: User who created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: Program that modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: The child row of the inventory alert that that is dependent on the parent.
